definition: second month of a season/middle/intermediate/second amongst brothers
to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment

sentences.english: Catholics pray to Mary as an intercessor.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒向瑪利亞祈禱，並把她看作仲裁者。

sentences.english: During the arbitration proceedings, the question of truncated arbitration sometimes occurs.
sentences.chinese: 在仲裁程序進行中，有時會出現缺員仲裁的問題。

sentences.english: During the arbitration proceedings, the question of truncated arbitration sometimes occurs.
sentences.chinese: 在仲裁程序進行中，有時會出現缺員仲裁的問題。

sentences.english: Today that a panel of arbitrators has decided in favor of our company.
sentences.chinese: 今天仲裁團做出了有利於我們公司的裁決。

sentences.english: All arbitration fees will be borne by Party B and be paid in advance.
sentences.chinese: 涉及仲裁費用，全部由乙方承擔並預交。

sentences.english: The cost for arbitration shall be borne by the losing party if it is not otherwise ruled by the arbitration authority.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁費除仲裁機關另有裁決外均應由敗訴方負擔。

sentences.english: The cost for arbitration shall be borne by the losing party if it is not otherwise ruled by the arbitration authority.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁費除仲裁機關另有裁決外均應由敗訴方負擔。

sentences.english: An arbitral tribunal shall be normally made up of three arbitrators .
sentences.chinese: 仲裁庭一般由三名仲裁員組成。

sentences.english: An arbitral tribunal shall be normally made up of three arbitrators .
sentences.chinese: 仲裁庭一般由三名仲裁員組成。

sentences.english: The CEAC features custom-made arbitration rules for China-related trade.
sentences.chinese: 這家機構的特色在於它的仲裁規定。

sentences.english: The award made by the Tribunal shall be final and binding upon both parities.
sentences.chinese: 該仲裁庭的裁決是終局的，對雙方均具有約束力。

sentences.english: The DAB shall be deemed to be not acting as arbitrator(s).
sentences.chinese: 爭端裁決委員不應被視爲作爲仲裁人。

sentences.english: Article 20 A labor dispute arbitration commission shall have a roster of arbitrators.
sentences.chinese: 第二十條勞動爭議仲裁委員會應當設仲裁員名冊。

sentences.english: Article 20 A labor dispute arbitration commission shall have a roster of arbitrators.
sentences.chinese: 第二十條勞動爭議仲裁委員會應當設仲裁員名冊。

sentences.english: The arbitral award shall be final and binding upon both parties.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁裁決是終局的，對雙方都有約束力。

sentences.english: The order came from an arbitration court in the Hague. Greg Morsbach reports.
sentences.chinese: 這項判決是由海牙的一個仲裁法院定的。

definition: common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
(of a defendant) to respond to a charge/to defend oneself
to file a complaint/to appeal (to an authority, a higher court of justice etc)/complaint/appeal
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
